Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: pin(to:anchor:margin:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: The most basic and common constraints dedicated for constraining to all 4 anchors of the parent veiw: top, bottom. leading, trailing

Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: pinTopToBottom(of:margin:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: Creates opposite constraints: source top anchor to bottom anchor of the target view

Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: pinBottomToTop(of:margin:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: Creates opposite constraints: source bottom anchor to top anchor of the target view

Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: pinLeadingToTrailing(of:margin:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: Creates opposite constraints: source leading anchor to trailing anchor of the target view

Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: pinTrailingToLeading(of:margin:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: Creates opposite constraints: source trailing anchor to leading anchor of the target view

Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: set(_:_:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: Creates constraints for width/height dimensions with specified size

Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.name: center(to:axis:)
Extensions/View.html#/s:So6NSViewC15Quic.abstract: Creates constraints based on center x and y axis

Enums/Dimension.html#/s:15QuickConstrain.name: isWidth
Enums/Dimension.html#/s:15QuickConstrain.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves width dimentsion

Enums/Dimension.html#/s:15QuickConstrain.name: isHeight
Enums/Dimension.html#/s:15QuickConstrain.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves height dimentsion

Enums/Axis.html#/s:15QuickConstraint4Axi.name: isX
Enums/Axis.html#/s:15QuickConstraint4Axi.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves horizontal//x axis

Enums/Axis.html#/s:15QuickConstraint4Axi.name: isY
Enums/Axis.html#/s:15QuickConstraint4Axi.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves vertical//y axis

Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.name: isTop
Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves top anchor

Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.name: isBottom
Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves bottom anchor

Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.name: isLeading
Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves leading anchor

Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.name: isTrailing
Enums/Anchor.html#/s:15QuickConstraint6A.abstract: Determines whether or not enum instance involves trailing anchor

Enums/Anchor.html.name: Anchor
Enums/Anchor.html.abstract: Enum providing definitions of anchors, including combinations
